text.section: In this section, "retailer" means any person who sells paint or paint supplies to a consumer.

A retailer shall display a poster developed and provided by the Department under subsection (c) of this section:
Within an area in which paint or paint supplies are sold or displayed; or
At each register or check-out aisle.

The Department shall develop and provide a poster to retailers that includes the following information:
The dangers and hazards of lead poisoning; and
A phone number that consumers can call for assistance in lead risk reduction and safe renovation practices.
